root.name: FeatureExtractionEngine
root.description: Simplify the feature extraction task by expose a simple feature extraction interface.
root.author: oeway - Wei Ouyang
root.changelog:
- Version 2.9.6.0 Date 2014-08-07 08:19:13
* ugly fix of the listener triggering bug
- Version 2.9.5.0 Date 2014-08-06 18:47:16
× fix bug of event trigger in user plugin
- Version 2.9.4.0 Date 2014-08-06 13:56:52
* add listener to monitor user plugin
- Version 2.9.3.0 Date 2014-08-06 13:26:35
× fixed channel extract bug
- Version 2.9.2.0 Date 2014-08-06 09:37:39
* support live sequence to perform real-time processing
- Version 2.9.1.0 Date 2014-08-05 07:09:22
* Add example to listen to the variables
- Version 2.9.0.0 Date 2014-08-04 06:28:40
* add remove extra output
- Version 2.8.0.0 Date 2014-08-02 20:52:30
* add arraySplitor
- Version 2.7.0.0 Date 2014-08-01 19:04:08
* fixed channel name bug
- Version 2.6.0.0 Date 2014-08-01 18:41:26
* fix progress frame bug
- Version 2.5.0.0 Date 2014-08-01 18:26:14
* fix bugs
- Version 2.4.0.0 Date 2014-07-31 19:08:51
* User plugin extended from featureExtractionPlugin interface can be used as block in protocol
- Version 2.3.0.0 Date 2014-07-31 13:33:07
* fixed gui initialization bug
- Version 2.2.0.0 Date 2014-07-31 12:22:53
* update customize plugin options when invoke the engine from other plugin
- Version 2.1.0.0 Date 2014-07-31 12:01:02
* Plugins extended from featureExtractionPlugin now can invoke FeatureExtractionEngine from their own
- Version 2.0.3.1 Date 2014-07-31 10:54:25
* change JDK version to 1.6 to be capatible with lower version
- Version 2.0.3.0 Date 2014-07-31 08:36:31
* set metadata for output merged sequence
- Version 2.0.2.0 Date 2014-07-30 14:04:37
* multi-group bug fixed
- Version 2.0.1.0 Date 2014-07-30 13:47:33
* ignore illegal input
- Version 2.0.0.0 Date 2014-07-30 13:28:21
* Totally redesigned the engine, more stable * todo: multi-thread processing
- Version 1.6.3.1 Date 2014-07-29 21:39:34
- Version 1.6.3.0 Date 2014-07-29 20:55:25
* X, Y direction bug
- Version 1.6.2.0 Date 2014-07-29 19:35:11
* fixed bug with X axis
- Version 1.6.0.0 Date 2014-07-29 18:55:46
* changed interface to allow adding EzcCmponent rather than only EzVar * fixed bug in transform along X and Y
- Version 1.5.4.0 Date 2014-07-28 20:18:06
* skip output length check
- Version 1.5.3.0 Date 2014-07-28 20:08:40
* fix channel count error
- Version 1.5.0.0 Date 2014-07-28 19:40:14
* fix feature group bug
- Version 1.4.0.0 Date 2014-07-28 18:55:46
* fix feature count bug
- Version 1.2.0.0 Date 2014-07-28 18:23:12
× fix some bugs
- Version 1.0.0.0 Date 2014-07-28 13:57:00
* rename the plugin * support protocol block * other improvements
- Version 0.0.1.0b Date 2014-07-27 21:07:39
